name: WebJobsTools
description: Set of Tools to manipulate Web Jobs in AzureRM
author: Darnell McMurrian
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: JobName
inputs.label: Job Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the job that needs to be stopped or started

inputs.name: AzureWebAppName
inputs.label: Azure Web App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure Web App that the job belongs to

inputs.name: JobState
inputs.label: Job State
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose if you want to start or stop the job

inputs.name: JobType
inputs.label: Job Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the type of job this is.

inputs.name: UserName
inputs.label: User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username to use for authentication.  This has to be the publish profile for the web app.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password from the publish profile.  You can use variables such as $(password) etc.
